items.preText: Saif Tanmoy: "What speed Ariful is blowing at?" -- Around 125kph
items.text: short of length around off, defended from the front foot
items.shortText: Ariful Haque to Taylor, no run

items.text: fuller on stumps and driven back towards the bowler off the front foot, Ariful fields the ball and throws towards the stumps at the striker's end and ends up hitting Taylor flush on the pads. Bangladesh are appealing for obstructing the field. The two umpires are having a chat and ask the bowler to continue in the end, Taylor was well outside his crease though when the ball hit him, but he never changed his direction
items.shortText: Ariful Haque to Taylor, no run

items.text: a tad fuller outside off, Taylor comes forward and drives it firmly, but straight to the short cover fielder
items.shortText: Ariful Haque to Taylor, no run

items.preText:
Wahid Quayum: "Bangladesh should let Zimbabwe score some runs so that when they bat they can have good practise for the middle order :)"

Mashrafe to continue, over the wicket now
items.text: length ball, angling across, defended from the crease towards covers
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: floated outside off stump, driven towards the left of mid-off for a quick single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, 1 run

items.text: length ball, around off, Taylor comes forward and looks to defend, the ball hit him near the handle
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: short of length this time, Taylor was looking to push at it, gets a thick inside edge towards square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: slower one this time, steered towards point, a fumble there a good recovery allows no extra run
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: slower one once more, pushed towards covers for a quick single
items.postText: Monirhk: "After Chattogram and Cumilla, I am eagerly waiting to see some comments about "Noakhali"..."
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, 1 run

items.text: length ball, punched from the back foot towards mid-off
items.postText: Ron: "Oh Wahid, you're opening up a can of worms there.... :-)"
items.shortText: Ariful Haque to Williams, no run

items.preText: Hakimuddin T Ja: "That was really poor from Bangladesh. There was nothing wrong or untoward from Taylor's end. Surprising part was they were unhappy with umpire's decision. "
items.text: short of length around off, punched gently towards the left of the point fielder
items.shortText: Ariful Haque to Williams, 1 run

items.text: lovely shot! It was a length ball, around middle, Taylor came forward, presented the full face, extended his arms for one bounce four, dead straight
items.shortText: Ariful Haque to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball, around middle and leg, tucked away behind square this time for one
items.shortText: Ariful Haque to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: short of length, pulled away towards deep square leg for another single
items.shortText: Ariful Haque to Williams, 1 run

items.text: short and wide and Taylor gives it the treatment it deserved. Slaps it between extra cover and mid-off for the second four off the over
items.shortText: Ariful Haque to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball, angling in towards the batsman, dabbed towards square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, 1 run

items.text: length ball, around middle and leg, glanced towards fine leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: fuller on stumps, Williams plays it from the crease and defends it on the leg side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: short of length outside off, Williams looks to punch it but the ball hits the inner half of the bat and goes towards square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: short of length outside off, punched straight to extra cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: a touch fuller but by no means a half-volley, Williams came forward and drove it on the up, didn't middle it and finds mid-off on the bounce
items.postText: MAS Mishu: "Good partnership between S Williams and Taylor. "
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.preText: Soumya Sarkar has the ball now
items.text: starts with a short one and Taylor pulls it behind square leg, the fine leg fielder came sprinting to his left but couldn't prevent the four
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball, around middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on for a quick single
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: fuller and wider, Williams look to go for a booming drive but fails to connect
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Williams, no run

items.text: a touch shorter this time, Williams connects the drive this time but finds Mashrafe at short extra cover
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Williams, no run
